verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> Now the Philistines נִלְחָמִ֣ים <S%H3898><s%> fought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיָּנֻ֜סוּ <S%H5127><s%> fled אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> and fell down חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> slain בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount הַגִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> Gilboa

וַיַּדְבְּק֣וּ <S%H1692><s%> followed hard פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> upon Saul וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and upon his sons וַיַּכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> slew פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹנָתָ֧ן <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִינָדָ֛ב <S%H41><s%> and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכִּי־ שׁ֖וּעַ <S%H4444><s%> and Malchishua בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> sons שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> Saul's

וַתִּכְבַּ֤ד <S%H3513><s%> went sore הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> And the battle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> against Saul וַיִּמְצָאֻ֥הוּ <S%H4672><s%> hit הַמּוֹרִ֖ים <S%H3384><s%> the archers אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> another בַּקָּ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> arch וַיָּ֥חֶל <S%H2342><s%> wounded מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> him and he was sore מֵהַמּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H3384><s%> the archers

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said שָׁאוּל֩ <S%H7586><s%> Saul לְנֹשֵׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֜יו <S%H3627><s%> to his armor שְׁלֹ֥ף <S%H8025><s%> Draw חַרְבְּךָ֣ ׀ <S%H2719><s%> thy sword וְדָקְרֵ֣נִי <S%H1856><s%> and thrust me through בָ֗הּ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise יָ֠בוֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> come הָעֲרֵלִ֨ים <S%H6189><s%> therewith lest these uncircumcised הָאֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וּדְקָרֻ֙נִי֙ <S%H1856><s%> and thrust me through וְהִתְעַלְּלוּ־ <S%H5953><s%> and abuse בִ֔י וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָה֙ <S%H14><s%> would נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> his armor כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יָרֵ֖א <S%H3372><s%> afraid מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> not for he was sore וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Therefore Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword וַיִּפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> and fell עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw נֹשֵֽׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> his armor כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> he fell גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on חַרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H2719><s%> likewise upon his sword וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> and died עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died שָׁא֡וּל <S%H7586><s%> So Saul וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> and his three בָּנָיו֩ <S%H1121><s%> sons וְנֹשֵׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> bearer כֵלָ֜יו <S%H3627><s%> his armor גַּ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> again כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲנָשָׁ֛יו <S%H376><s%> his men בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that same day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

וַיִּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H376><s%> the men יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <S%H5676><s%> that [were] on the other side הָעֵ֜מֶק <S%H6010><s%> of the valley וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> and [they] that [were] on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָ֙סוּ֙ <S%H5127><s%> fled אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> were dead שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> and that Saul וּבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> they forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶֽעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> the cities וַיָּנֻ֔סוּ <S%H5127><s%> and fled וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines וַיֵּֽשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בָּהֶֽן׃ ס

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> when the Philistines לְפַשֵּׁ֖ט <S%H6584><s%> to strip אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲלָלִ֑ים <S%H2491><s%> the slain וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <S%H4672><s%> that they found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> and his three בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> sons נֹפְלִ֖ים <S%H5307><s%> fallen בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount הַגִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <S%H1533><s%> Gilboa

וַֽיִּכְרְתוּ֙ <S%H3772><s%> And they cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head וַיַּפְשִׁ֖יטוּ <S%H6584><s%> and stripped off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> his armour וַיְשַׁלְּח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> and sent בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> into the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לְבַשֵּׂ֛ר <S%H1319><s%> to publish בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> [it in] the house עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H6091><s%> of their idols וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> and among the people

וַיָּשִׂ֙מוּ֙ <S%H7760><s%> And they put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> his armour בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house עַשְׁתָּר֑וֹת <S%H6252><s%> of Ashtaroth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּוִיָּתוֹ֙ <S%H1472><s%> his body תָּקְע֔וּ <S%H8628><s%> and they fastened בְּחוֹמַ֖ת <S%H2346><s%> to the wall בֵּ֥ית שָֽׁן׃ <S%H1052><s%> of Bethshan

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> And when the inhabitants יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> had done פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of that which the Philistines לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> to Saul

וַיָּק֜וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> arose כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men חַיִל֮ <S%H2428><s%> All the valiant וַיֵּלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> and walked כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלַּיְלָה֒ <S%H3915><s%> all night וַיִּקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּוִיַּ֣ת <S%H1472><s%> the body שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> גְּוִיֹּ֣ת <S%H1472><s%> and the bodies בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons מֵחוֹמַ֖ת <S%H2346><s%> from the wall בֵּ֣ית שָׁ֑ן <S%H1052><s%> of Bethshan וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came יָבֵ֔שָׁה <S%H3003><s%> to Jabesh וַיִּשְׂרְפ֥וּ <S%H8313><s%> and burnt אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6106><s%> their bones וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <S%H6912><s%> and buried תַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under הָאֶ֖שֶׁל <S%H815><s%> [them] under a tree בְּיָבֵ֑שָׁה <S%H3003><s%> at Jabesh וַיָּצֻ֖מוּ <S%H6684><s%> and fasted שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days פ
